subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: A federal judge Monday dismissed an antitrust lawsuit filed against Nascar by a Kentucky track that was left off its premier racing circuit. Kentucky Speedway said that Nascar had conspired to leave it and other tracks out of the Sprint Cup series — formerly known as the Nextel Cup series — despite their superior amenities.
